text: Ned Arnel Menc√≠a (born October 22, 1967) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, singer, and voice artist. Mencia lives with his wife Amy, whom he married in 2003, in Los Angeles, California. They have two children: Lucas Pablo Mencia (born December 14, 2006) and Nicholas Mencia. ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Comedians from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Honduran people
